#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
   int nCases, n,sum=0;
   cin>>nCases;
   while(nCases--)
   {      sum=0;    
         cin>>n;
         if(n>23)
         {printf("8388607\n");
             }
         
         else
         {
         for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
         {       if(i==1)
                 sum+=1;
                 else if(i==2)
                 sum+=6;
                 else
                 sum+=(((int)((double)(pow(2.0,((i-2)%23))))*(i%8388608)*((i+1)%8388608))%8388608); 
                        
                 
                 sum%=8388608;
         }
                        
         cout<<sum<<endl;         
         }
   }
           
   
    
        
    
    return 0;
    
}
